name: Dr. Sarah Mitchell
title: MD - Senior Cardiologist
doc_abouts: Dr. Sarah Mitchell is a highly experienced cardiologist with over 15 years of medical practice. She specializes in treating complex cardiovascular diseases and is renowned for her compassionate patient care. Dr. Mitchell has worked in various leading hospitals and has contributed to significant medical research in cardiology.
doc_awards: Best Cardiologist Award - Bangladesh Cardiac Association (2021)
Excellence in Cardiac Care - Dhaka Medical Association (2019)

name: Dr. Rafiq Ahmed
title: MD - Orthopedic Surgeon
doc_abouts: Dr. Rafiq Ahmed is a leading orthopedic surgeon specializing in bone and joint disorders. With over 20 years of experience, he has successfully treated thousands of patients suffering from musculoskeletal issues. He is known for his minimally invasive surgical techniques and dedication to improving patient mobility.
doc_awards: Best Orthopedic Surgeon - Bangladesh Medical Council (2021)
Top Orthopedic Specialist - Dhaka Medical Awards (2020)

name: Dr. Farhana Yasmin
title: MBBS - Pediatrician
doc_abouts: Dr. Farhana Yasmin is a compassionate pediatrician with extensive experience in child healthcare. She is highly skilled in treating children with various medical conditions and focuses on providing personalized care for each child. Dr. Yasmin also emphasizes preventive care to ensure the overall well-being of her young patients.
doc_education: Diploma in Child Health - University of Sydney
Fellowship in Pediatric Care - Harvard Medical School
doc_awards: Best Pediatrician Award - Bangladesh Pediatric Society (2020)
Excellence in Child Care - Dhaka Shishu Hospital (2019)
Top Pediatric Specialist - Dhaka Medical Awards (2021)

name: Dr. Ahmed Siddiqui
title: DDS - Dental Surgeon
doc_abouts: Dr. Ahmed Siddiqui is an expert dental surgeon with over 10 years of experience in cosmetic and restorative dentistry. He is committed to providing patients with excellent dental care, utilizing the latest techniques in dental surgery. His practice is patient-centered, focusing on delivering comfortable and effective treatments.
doc_education: Fellowship - American Academy of Implant Dentistry
doc_awards: Best Dental Surgeon - Bangladesh Dental Association (2021)
Top Dental Specialist - Dhaka Medical Awards (2020)
